actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Lewis amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Lewis to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Lewis to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to strike Section 339(b) of the National Highway System Designation Act of 1995 and makes construction of Type II noise barriers eligible for funds from the surface transportation block grant programs.
